channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Tesla cuts its car prices around the world after week of turmoil for the company
item.description: The company dropped its starting prices of its Model X, Model Y and Model S by $2,000 in the U.S.
item.content:encoded:
The company dropped its starting prices of its Model X, Model Y and Model S by $2,000 in the U.S.

(Image credit: Ebrahim Noroozi)
item.dc:creator: Huo Jingnan

item.title: Terry Anderson, AP reporter held captive for years, dies at 76
item.description: Snatched from a street in war-torn Lebanon in 1985, reporter Terry Andersen chronicled his years of imprisonment in a 1993 best-selling book. He died at home in New York on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
Snatched from a street in war-torn Lebanon in 1985, reporter Terry Andersen chronicled his years of imprisonment in a 1993 best-selling book. He died at home in New York on Sunday.

(Image credit: Santiago Lyon)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Conductor Andrew Davis, who headed orchestras on 3 continents, dies at 80
item.description: Davis led the Toronto Symphony Orchestra, Britain's Glyndebourne Festival, the BBC Symphony Orchestra, the Melbourne Symphony Orchestra and the Lyric Opera in Chicago.
item.content:encoded:
Capriccio in the Metropolitan Opera at New York's Lincoln Center, March 25, 2011.'/>

Davis led the Toronto Symphony Orchestra, Britain's Glyndebourne Festival, the BBC Symphony Orchestra, the Melbourne Symphony Orchestra and the Lyric Opera in Chicago.

(Image credit: Richard Drew)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: The Lyrids meteor shower is peaking. Here's how to enjoy it with a bright moon
item.description: The Lyrids meteor shower is active until April 29 and is peaking overnight from Sunday into Monday. To see it, it's best to find an area with trees or a mountain blocking out the moon.
item.content:encoded: The Lyrids meteor shower is active until April 29 and is peaking overnight from Sunday into Monday. To see it, it's best to find an area with trees or a mountain blocking out the moon.
item.dc:creator: Huo Jingnan

item.title: In Ukraine, the vote to renew U.S. aid was cheered. But unease for the future remains
item.description: Congress moved a step closer on Saturday toward finalizing long-delayed military assistance for Ukraine. But relief among Ukrainians has been mixed with uneasiness over future U.S. assistance.
item.content:encoded:
Congress moved a step closer on Saturday toward finalizing long-delayed military assistance for Ukraine. But relief among Ukrainians has been mixed with uneasiness over future U.S. assistance.

(Image credit: Efrem Lukatsky)
item.dc:creator: Joanna Kakissis

item.title: Photos: Jerusalem's sacred crossroads endures in a time of war
item.description: The convergence of three Christian, Muslim and Jewish holidays this spring led to fears of violence. But the city central to these major religions has remained largely peaceful.
item.content:encoded: The convergence of three Christian, Muslim and Jewish holidays this spring led to fears of violence. But the city central to these major religions has remained largely peaceful.
item.dc:creator: Ayman Oghanna

item.title: An AI Salvador Dalí will answer any question when called on his famous 'lobster phone'
item.description: Ask Dalí, a new AI installation based on a copy of Dalí's iconic sculpture, allows visitors to pick up the crustacean-shaped receiver, ask a question, and hear Dalí's response.
item.content:encoded: Ask Dalí, a new AI installation based on a copy of Dalí's iconic sculpture, allows visitors to pick up the crustacean-shaped receiver, ask a question, and hear Dalí's response.
item.dc:creator: Chloe Veltman

item.title: Trump cancels rally due to weather, as he tries to balance his trial and campaign
item.description: Donald Trump had to cancel his first planned rally since the start of his criminal hush money trial because of a storm Saturday evening in North Carolina.
item.content:encoded:
Donald Trump had to cancel his first planned rally since the start of his criminal hush money trial because of a storm Saturday evening in North Carolina.

(Image credit: Chris Seward)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: 15 people injured in tram crash at Universal Studios Hollywood
item.description: A tram accident at Universal Studios Hollywood in Los Angeles injured 15 people Saturday night, authorities and the company said.
item.content:encoded:
A tram accident at Universal Studios Hollywood in Los Angeles injured 15 people Saturday night, authorities and the company said.

(Image credit: Damian Dovarganes)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Gaza hostages raise painful reminders as Jews prepare for Passover
item.description: Among the themes of Passover is freedom from captivity. For many Jews this year, the holiday brings up the pain of knowledge that hostages are still captive after the Oct. 7 Hamas attack on Israel.
item.content:encoded: Among the themes of Passover is freedom from captivity. For many Jews this year, the holiday brings up the pain of knowledge that hostages are still captive after the Oct. 7 Hamas attack on Israel.
item.dc:creator: Jason DeRose
